name: @pxblue/react-components
description: React components for PX Blue applications

scripts.install:dependencies: cd component-demo/showcase && yarn && cd ../storybook && yarn && cd ../..
scripts.start:showcase: yarn install:dependencies && yarn link:components && cd component-demo/showcase && yarn start
scripts.start:storybook: yarn install:dependencies && yarn link:components && cd component-demo/storybook && yarn start

author: pxblue <pxblue@eaton.com>
